divs: Sighting DetailsThe sighting I speak of happens almost every night in Murraysville Pa.. I am sure MUFON has heard about it! How come you guys are not covering this?? There is so much footage it's funny. This is the nail in the coffin.. This is the proof we have been waiting for.. They want us to meet them.. Are you guys shills or something? Please contact me with any information please! Thank you...
